entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CA1861 skip cases where the array is mutated later #86414
  • revise how we pass config settings to benchmarkdotnet for SPMI collections #86410
    8.0.0
  • Potential optimizations creating intrinsic Vector from scalar #86405
  • [API Proposal]: Convert between degrees and radians #86402
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #86399
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.HasIconFlag()' #86398
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] KeepNativeSymbols=true breaks SteppingTests.SkipWasmFunctionsAccordinglyJustMyCode #86387
  • The context has expired and can no longer be used #86385
  • Blazor WASM Debugger #86395
  • Android x86/x64 CI machine issue: Failure calling service package: Broken pipe #86383
    Future
  • [MSVC] a mistake in valuenum.h #86372
    8.0.0
  • .Net 6 System.Process.Start cannot launch a self contained .net core 2.2 web app #86368
  • `PublishTrimmed` causing `dotnet publish` to hang #86379
  • Blazor WASM Hosted app fails to run when Nuget Packages upgraded to 8.0.0-preview-4.23260.4 #86364
  • Prevent CS0121 (ambiguous method calls) resulting from config binding source gen #86363
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure: System.Drawing.Tests.GdiplusTests.IsAtLeastLibgdiplus6 #32449
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Common is not supported on this platform #86412
  • [Perf] Alpine/x64: 7 Regressions on 4/6/2023 3:49:07 PM #84988
    8.0.0
  • NRE in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventPipePayloadDecoder if Threading event keywords are enabled. #78006
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to help keep nullable annotations clean and efficient #85527
  • Update lvSingleDefRegCandidate after CSE to get more candidates for EHwrite thru #86200
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend upgrading reference tuples to the more efficient value tuples #85488
  • Option to Disable JIT Optimizations for specific .NET Core Assembly #76240
    8.0.0
  • Support single-file core dump generation on Linux/MacOS in 8.0 #68676
    8.0.0
  • VS4Mac needs a runtime API to symbolize managed IPs #61186
    8.0.0
  • Feature: Add a diagnostics IPC command to dynamically emit perfmap files #83056
    8.0.0
  • Math & MathF: Conversion constants between degrees and radians #38566
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\debuginfo\\tester\\tester.cmd #83575
    8.0.0
  • DisallowAllDefaultValues behaves unexpectedly for null #83797
    8.0.0
  • EmailAddress data annotation should be able to validate emails without needing extra regex. #86392
  • [API Proposal]: update legacy apis with ICollection<T> / IReadOnlyCollection<T>/ IEnumerabe<T> #86219
  • [API Proposal]: Add ForeachAsync in Enumerable #85199
  • JIT: Fix test setting general JitStress #86185
    8.0.0
  • DebuggerSupport = false crashes ILC when publishing with NativeAOT (.NET 8 P4) #86386
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #86033
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions from "Add binary parsing support to integer types" #85340
  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[argNum].slot == 2' #83167
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of ToDictionary that turns an IEnumerable of KeyValuePair or ValueTuple #65925
    Future
  • Maui - .Net iOS App Store rejection: App references non-public symbols #86156
  • BitConverter.HalfToInt16Bits(Half) result comparison issue #82680
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_Path #84311
    8.0.0
  • "System.ArgumentException: type" while publishing NativeAOT console app with IlcGenerateMstatFile=true #86376
  • ProcessTests.Test[Peak]WorkingSet[64] fail on Fedora 39 #83129
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\typeequivalence\\simple\\Simple\\Simple.cmd #86232

PullRequests

Created

  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move the GCC and CLR Tools Unit Tests legs to use the global build template #86411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix assertprop assert for missing handle flag #86409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade build to use .NET 8 Preview 4 SDK #86408
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove extraneous VN code #86407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add basic support for StringMarshalling in GeneratedComInterface #86404
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Generate jiterpreter feature detect modules dynamically #86401
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make IDerivedTest.CallBaseInterfaceMethod_EnsureQiCalledOnce trim-friendly #86397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Fix Base64 decoding regressions from whitespace handling #86396
    area-System.Memory
  • Bugfix/66229 processing empty dictionary items #86394
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Switch RhConfig from TCHAR to char #86393
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Test check on EventPipe NativeAOT #86389
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a simple store-forwarding optimization for structs returned in registers #86388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Update Wasm SDK pack version in workload manifest #86382
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Describe ES6 modules #86381
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Do not assert RyuJIT if InitializeArray cannot be expanded #86373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in NativeRuntimeEventSourceTest #86370
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Tune inliner for callees with pinvokes #86362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable config binding gen tests that pass #86406
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2182497 #86369
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure not to strip `endfilter` #86374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete the verification type system #86179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Implement JIT support for the arm64 Crc and Dp intrinsics… #86106
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve constant folding for some frozen objects #86318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove RequiredAttribute.DisallowAllDefaultValues #86378
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix DAC syncblk API so the SOS tests stop failing intermittently #86339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Initial build configuration for Haiku #86303
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop specifying general JitStress in OSR/largefuncletframe #86380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include Native AOT pdbs in Helix payload #86367
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Special-case array/list/ReadOnlyDictionary in Dictionary(IEnumerable, …) ctors #86254
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix floating-point args passing #86244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix using startupOptions when loadBootResource is not specified #86371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Baseline Native AOT tests #86366
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix the regs conflicts within the `addResolution` for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #86294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the process. #85649
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix debug compile error in mono mini #86329
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Restructure WellKnownOids.cs #84921
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, size-reduction
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Add tests for diagnostics, and copy attributes from base methods to generated shadowing methods #86344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][tests] Enable exception handling runtime tests on Interpreter #86307
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2182081 #86361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][node] Disable System.Net.Http.Functional with timeouts #86321
    arch-wasm, disabled-test
  • Exclude profiler/r2r tests from building #86314
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect usage of u16_strcmp instead of u16_strncmp #86356
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delay reg free for tbx_1reg #86292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ternlog recognition to lower #86228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove System.Reflection wrappers from the STJ source generator. #86334
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize the CRC64 implementation #85221
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments #86346
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Set WasmEnableWebcil to true by default #86330
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest and StartupHookTests on mobile #86269
    needs-area-label
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0-staging] Update some Windows server helix queues for mono #86355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, runtime-mono
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [LoongArch64] Enable the "TC_QuickJitForLoops" on LoongArch64. #86022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix mapping of redeclared type parameters #86353
    needs-area-label
  • [WIP] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
